snippet.title: Mini Healer Early Access Trailer
snippet.description:
Mini Healer is an MMO inspired RPG where you play as the Healer in a party to venture into the Great Vault to fight and collect amazing loot. It also added the ARPG inspired deep character customization and itemization.

Wishlist on Steam now!
https://store.steampowered.com/app/955740/Mini_Healer/
